mdRecord.dcterms:description: This is a copy from the records of the Lexington School Board passed at a meeting held at the court-house on April 10, 1935. The addition of a third year of high school at the colored high school has not met the expectations of the School Board and they have determined to continue the program one more year. If "a very material increase in the enrollment for the next session" does not appear, the third year will be discontinued.
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Lexington School Board Disappointed with Added Third Year, April 10, 1935
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: African Americans -- Education
